item.description: 爬蟲基礎 Bobson Lin 2019-11-29 Made with WebSlides OUTLINE Fetch Data and Save Files Reading and Writing Files Parsing Files CSV XML Fetch Data and Save Files urllib is a Python package that collects several modules for working with URLs. from urllib.request import urlretrieve try: urlretrieve('https://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/iso_8859-1.txt', './hello.txt') except Exception as e: print('發生錯誤,', e) docs.python.org - urllib.request - 21.6.24. Legacy interface Reading and Writing Files Two ways for reading and writing files in Python
